feature.name: hard_reset_disable
feature.doc: Init the device without hard reset.

define.name: max_nof_system_ports
define.doc: Max number of system ports, may use software to indicate invalid system port

define.name: invalid_system_port
define.doc: invalid system port - defined as the last system port

define.name: invalid_fap_id
define.doc: invalid FAP id - defined as the last FAP id

define.name: fap_ids_per_core_bits
define.doc: number of bits in FAP IDs per core

define.name: nof_cores
define.doc: Number of cores in the device.

numeric.name: core_max_nof_bits
numeric.doc: Max number of cores bits to represent core. should be log2(nof_cores)

numeric.name: max_nof_fap_ids_per_core
numeric.doc: maximal number of FAP IDs per core

numeric.name: max_nof_fap_ids_per_device
numeric.doc: maximal number of FAP IDs per device

numeric.name: system_ref_core_clock_khz
numeric.doc: Specifies system reference clock speed in kHz.

numeric.name: ref_core_clock_mhz
numeric.doc: Reference clock comes from the board

numeric.name: maximal_core_bandwidth_kbps
numeric.doc: Maximal core bandwidth in Kbits per second

numeric.name: nof_faps
numeric.doc: Number of supported faps in the system.

numeric.name: nof_sku_bits
numeric.doc: nof LSB bits of device_is dedicated for SKU

numeric.name: emulation_system
numeric.doc: Checking if the device is ran on emulation.

numeric.name: bist_enable
numeric.doc: Determines if to run Memory Built-In Self-Test (MBIST) of internal memories (tables) during startup.

numeric.name: nof_bits_for_nof_cores
numeric.doc: Number of bits to represent core.

table.name: ecc_err_masking
table.doc: Table containing all registers and fields that need their ECC errors to be masked due to issues when reading

value.name: ecc_1bit_err_mask_reg
value.doc: Register for masking 1 bit ECC errors

value.name: ecc_1bit_err_field
value.doc: Array of fields for masking 1 bit ECC errors. Last element of the array myst always be -1.

value.name: ecc_2bit_err_mask_reg
value.doc: Register for masking 2 bit ECC errors

value.name: ecc_2bit_err_field
value.doc: Array of fields for masking 2 bit ECC errors. Last element of the array myst always be -1.
